root.name: Eyestorm
root.description: OverviewEyestorm is a game developed and published by 3Crew Games for the Xbox Live Indie Games platform. Eyestorm was released on January 3rd, 2012 for the price of 240 Microsoft Points (or $3).GameplayIn Eyestorm the object is to take a helicopter and perform various types of rescue missions. Some of the missions involve delivering cargo or rescuing survivors. Each mission has a set time limit the goal must be completed in.After a mission has successfully been completed experience points will be awarded based on a number of factors. These factors include the type of helicopter that was chosen and the difficulty level of the mission.There are three different helicopters that can be chosen in each mission, each of which has different stats which may be useful for different types of missions.
